name: NousWatchman
0:
”Alexa, turn on DAIKIN AC”
”Alexa, set DAIKIN AC to HEAT”
”Alexa, lock FRONT DOOR”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The skill works in conjunction with Nous Logic's hardware and ACAir/nGarage/nTlock application ( available in Appstore and Google Play store). User must sign up for the service, sign in in the applcation and configure actual hardware, link Nous Logic account in for this skill before controlling the hardware by voice.
Your Nous Logic's hardware can be fully controlled by voice. After linking your Nous Logic account with Amazon account, user just commands Alexa to control your named devices.
